data_table.description: Birth History Questionnaire, Offspring Cohort Exam 6

variable.name: shareid
variable.description: UNIQUE PARTICIPANT ID

variable.name: IDTYPE
variable.description: COHORT IDENTIFIER

variable.name: BW2
variable.description: WHAT WAS YOUR BIRTHWEIGHT IN POUNDS

variable.name: BW3
variable.description: WHAT WAS YOUR BIRTHWEIGHT IN OUNCES

variable.name: BW4
variable.description: WHAT SOURCE DID YOU USE TO REPORT YOUR BIRTHWEIGHT LISTED ABOVE

variable.name: BW5
variable.description: HOW CERTAIN ARE YOU ABOUT YOUR BIRTHWEIGHT

variable.name: BW6
variable.description: WHEN YOU WERE BORN, HOW WERE YOU DELIVERED?

variable.name: BW10
variable.description: WHILE YOUR MOTHER WAS PREGNANT WITH YOU, DID SHE HAVE DIABETES?

variable.name: BW11
variable.description: WHILE YOUR MOTHER WAS PREGNANT WITH YOU, DID SHE HAVE HYPERTENSION OR HIGH BLOOD PRESSURE?

variable.name: BW12
variable.description: WAS YOUR MOTHER OVERWEIGHT BEFORE SHE WAS PREGNANT WITH YOU?

variable.name: BW13
variable.description: WHILE YOUR MOTHER WAS PREGNANT WITH YOU, DID SHE GAIN MORE THAN 30 POUNDS?

variable.name: BW14
variable.description: IF YES TO BW13, PLEASE WRITE IN ACTUAL WEIGHT GAIN IN POUNDS

variable.name: BW15
variable.description: HOW MANY CHILDREN DID YOUR MOTHER HAVE?

variable.name: BW16
variable.description: WHAT WAS YOUR BIRTH ORDER? (FOR EXAMPLE, IF YOU ARE THE OLDEST OF THREE CHILDREN BORN TO YOUR MOTHER YOU WOULD PUT 1. IF YOU ARE THE YOUNGEST IN THIS GROUP YOU WOULD PUT 3)

variable.name: BW17
variable.description: WERE YOU OVERWEIGHT AS A CHILD?

variable.name: BW18
variable.description: YOUR ESTIMATED HEIGHT AT AGE 18, IN FEET

variable.name: BW19
variable.description: YOUR ESTIMATED HEIGHT AT AGE 18, IN INCHES

variable.name: BW20
variable.description: YOUR ESTIMATED WEIGHT AT AGE 18, IN POUNDS

variable.name: BW22
variable.description: IF YOU ARE A WOMAN, HOW MANY LIVE BIRTHS HAVE YOU HAD?

variable.name: BW24
variable.description: LIVE-BIRTH PREGNANCY #1: YOUR ESTIMATED WEIGHT JUST PRIOR TO THIS PREGNANCY (BEFORE YOU KNEW YOU WERE PREGNANT) IN POUNDS

variable.name: BW25
variable.description: LIVE-BIRTH PREGNANCY #1: BIRTHWEIGHT OF CHILD - POUNDS

variable.name: BW26
variable.description: LIVE-BIRTH PREGNANCY #1: BIRHTWEIGHT OF CHILD - OUNCES

variable.name: BW27
variable.description: LIVE-BIRTH PREGNANCY #1: YOUR AGE AT THE BIRTH OF THIS CHILD - YEARS

variable.name: BW28
variable.description: LIVE-BIRTH PREGNANCY #1: BABY DELIVERY TIME AS COMPARED TO PHYSICIAN'S ESTIMATE (NUMBER OF WEEKS EARLY OR LATE-FOR INSTANCE CIRCLE NUMBER OF WEEKS)

variable.name: BW29
variable.description: LIVE-BIRTH PREGNANCY #1: DID YOU HAVE DIABETES DURING THIS PREGNANCY?

variable.name: BW30
variable.description: LIVE-BIRTH PREGNANCY #1: DID YOU HAVE HYPERTENSION DURING THIS PREGNANCY?

variable.name: BW31
variable.description: LIVE-BIRTH PREGNANCY #1: OBESE/OVERWEIGHT BEFORE GETTING PREGNANT

variable.name: BW32
variable.description: LIVE-BIRTH PREGNANCY #1: GAINED MORE THAN 30 POUNDS DURING THE PREGNANCY?

variable.name: BW33
variable.description: LIVE-BIRTH PREGNANCY #1: IF YES TO BW32, WRITE IN NUMBER OF POUNDS

variable.name: BW34
variable.description: LIVE-BIRTH PREGNANCY #1: SMOKED CIGARETTES DURING THE PREGNANCY?

variable.name: BW35
variable.description: LIVE-BIRTH PREGNANCY #1: IF YES TO BW34, WRITE IN NUMBER SMOKED PER DAY

variable.name: BW37
variable.description: LIVE-BIRTH PREGNANCY #2: YOUR ESTIMATED WEIGHT JUST PRIOR TO THIS PREGNANCY (BEFORE YOU KNEW YOU WERE PREGNANT) IN POUNDS

variable.name: BW38
variable.description: LIVE-BIRTH PREGNANCY #2: BIRTHWEIGHT OF CHILD - POUNDS

variable.description: LIVE-BIRTH PREGNANCY #2: BIRHTWEIGHT OF CHILD - OUNCES

variable.name: BW40
variable.description: LIVE-BIRTH PREGNANCY #2: YOUR AGE AT THE BIRTH OF THIS CHILD - YEARS

variable.name: BW41
variable.description: LIVE-BIRTH PREGNANCY #2: BABY DELIVERY TIME AS COMPARED TO PHYSICIAN'S ESTIMATE (NUMBER OF WEEKS EARLY OR LATE-FOR INSTANCE CIRCLE NUMBER OF WEEKS)

variable.name: BW42
variable.description: LIVE-BIRTH PREGNANCY #2: DID YOU HAVE DIABETES DURING THIS PREGNANCY?

variable.name: BW43
variable.description: LIVE-BIRTH PREGNANCY #2: DID YOU HAVE HYPERTENSION DURING THIS PREGNANCY?

variable.description: LIVE-BIRTH PREGNANCY #2: OBESE/OVERWEIGHT BEFORE GETTING PREGNANT?

variable.description: LIVE-BIRTH PREGNANCY #2: SMOKED CIGARETTES DURING THE PREGNANCY

variable.name: BW48
variable.description: LIVE-BIRTH PREGNANCY #2: IF YES TO BW47, WRITE IN NUMBER SMOKED PER DAY

variable.description: LIVE-BIRTH PREGNANCY #3: YOUR ESTIMATED WEIGHT JUST PRIOR TO THIS PREGNANCY (BEFORE YOU KNEW YOU WERE PREGNANT) IN POUNDS
